text: kuch log to kahenge ke as-haabe kahaf teen thein aur chautha un ka kutta tha, kuch kahenge ke paanch thein aur cheta un ka kutta tha, ghaib ki baato mein atkal (ke teer ta-ke) chalaate hai, kuch kahenge ke wo saath hai aur aatwa un ka kutta hai, aap keh dijiye ke mera parvardigaar un ki tedaad ko ba-qoobi jaane wala hai, unhe bahuth hee kam log jaante hai, pas aap unke muqaddame mein sirf sarsari guftago hee kare aur un mein se kisi se un ke baare mein pooch gaj bhi na kare
